objects.text:
• One-Touch Operation
• 6-Cup Capacity
• Automatic Keep-Warm
• Easy-to-Clean Nonstick Pot

Perfect for rice, soups, chili, and more!
Simple operation with automatic features.
Makes cooking effortless for busy families.

product_details.description: "Enjoy easy home cooking with the AROMA 6-Cup (Cooked) Pot-Style Rice Cooker. Restaurant-quality rice. Healthy meals. Delicious one-pot dishes. Prepare all this and more at the flip of a switch! Aroma takes the cook out of home cooking - turning kitchen time into your time! Help the kids with homework, get creative at play time or pick up that novel you've been waiting to dive into. All while delivering hot, hearty and healthy meals the entire family will love.This convenient cooker's compact capacity perfectly cooks 2 to 6 cups of any variety of rice. Once the rice has finished, it will automatically switch to Keep-Warm so there's no need for monitoring or stirring. It's also perfect for oatmeal, chili, jambalaya, soups and so much more! And when the cooking is done, the inner cooking pot and all accessories remove for easy cleanup in the dishwasher." Perfectly prepares 2 to 6 cups of any variety of cooked rice Simple, one-touch operation with automatic Keep-Warm Great for soups, jambalaya, chili and so much more! Full-view tempered glass lid Easy-to-clean, nonstick removable inner pot Includes Rice Measuring Cup and Serving Spatula Brand - AROMA ** Capacity - 6 Cups ** Product Dimensions - 8.13"D x 8.9"W x 8"H ** Power Source - Corded Electric ** Product Care Instructions - Hand Wash **

banner_details:
This banner prominently features a modern kitchen appliance with a minimal and clean design approach. The top section showcases a bold headline (id: "heading") and supporting tagline (id: "tagline") in dark typography over a soft pink gradient background. Key product features (id: "features") are listed as bullet points to the left of a centrally aligned white rice cooker image (id: "product_image") that conveys freshness and utility. Underneath, the product name (id: "product_name") is rendered in uppercase bold lettering, followed by the promotional price (id: "price") in large, vibrant orange typography. The call-to-action (id: "cta") is centered inside a vivid orange button (id: "cta_button"), and a small paragraph of explanatory text (id: "description") concludes the layout, highlighting the product’s benefits. Subtle gradients, radial circle overlays, and background dot patterns add depth and texture.

**Color Palette:**
- Soft Peach Gradient: #F8F9FA → #E9ECEF
- Accent Coral: #F06449
- Deep Gray Text: #343A40, #495057, #212529
- Secondary Muted Gray: #6C757D
- CTA Button Text: #FFFFFF
product_color: The product image showcases a sleek and modern rice cooker with a clean white body (#FFFFFF), symbolizing purity and simplicity. The matte black lid edge (#2E2E2E) adds a strong contrast, giving the product a premium feel. Highlights on the lid and glass top use soft greys (#B0B0B0) to blend into the white body without overpowering it. The indicator lights feature a vivid amber-orange (#F4A300) for "Warm" and a bold red (#D12A1D) for "Cook," adding functional vibrancy to the design. These colors are well-balanced and draw attention while ensuring elegance, making them ideal for a crisp, attractive advertisement banner.
